title: FPS Drop
body: For the last few days my FPS has dropped from 100 to about 15. Once I am in game it is immediately there. Ive dropped all the settings to low and there is no fix. In addition, my hotkeys are completely different and i cannot change them. When I check my hotkeys in the client before the game loads, they are correct, but once I am in game they are set to default. I don't know what to do from here! I am so frustrated with the client updates and the consistent issues!

replies.body:
Damn, it sounds like you've got a combination of issues here.  It sucks, but I can help!  The bindings issue could be a resultt of a corrupt config, but resetting them should help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

That should get your settings resync'd to our servers.

Regarding your FPS, it might not be your settings causing it.  Other factors could involve outdated drivers or even bad game files.  You'll want to go through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help with this!  

Let me know how this works out for you, but be sure to test it in customs!
I was able to fix the key bindings, but the FPS is still loading in very low. I went through the entire FPS guide and it changed nothing. This is so frustrating

We made some progress, don't give up!  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will work with you on this!  Grab the logs provide by the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach it to your ticket for more context.  See you there!
